author: Arsene Lupin III
subject: Re: Lupin the 3rd 2000 TV Special Official Website
body:
> The official website for the new special is up at 
> http://www.ntv.co.jp/kinro/h120728.html
> 
> I can't read a damn word of it, so anyone can say
> what it says please share.

I could take more time to translate, but here's what I
got out of it at the very first:

Title: "Lupin the Third: One-Dollar Money Woes"
Story: Something to do about a New York auction and a
BOW (whether that is an abbreviation or an actual
bow-and-arrow bow, I don't know) that is selling for
one dollar. Jigen and Goemon do something, yadda yadda
(I'll need my Kanji dictionary for lotsa this crap),
and the tag line at the end is VERY intriguing:
"Could Lupin really have died?!"
Back later with more, OK?
